title: Did Betsy DeVos Say Schools Can’t Plan for a COVID-19 Outbreak That ‘Hasn’t Happened Yet’?
subtitle: The U.S. secretary of education's actual statement came during a CNN interview that went a bit in circles.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In response to a question in a July 2020 CNN interview about what would happen if a COVID-19 outbreak occurred in schools, U.S. Education Secretary Betsy DeVos said, “You can’t plan for something that hasn’t happened yet.”
